title: UK Border Force
resume: At a time when global population shifts are becoming ever more complex and difficult to police, we follow the work of the UK’s newly created Borders and Immigration Agency and its team of dedicated Immigration Officers as they toil around-the-clock to secure our country’s borders and fight illegal immigration.
